A good trader/investor is able to keep his emotions in check. Win / lose  you will need move on and onto the drawing board to look for the next opportunity.If you keep worrying about a loss or a recent missed opportunity (TP too early etc)  then it will only affect your game plan and it might make you miss more opportunities.Winning and losing is part of the game  as long as the overall ROI is still positive  you are definitely doing something right and keep on doing it. 👍Happy weekends all Hustlepeople!
